meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a close weave, used for embroidery.
meanings.sent1: I bought some etamin to make a beautiful embroidered pillow.
meanings.sent2: The etamin fabric was perfect for creating intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the etamin was a great place to nap, not realizing it was meant for embroidery.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like threads on etamin, weaving a story that captivated all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filtered through the etamin, casting a delicate pattern on the floor.

meanings.definition: A type of embroidery done on etamin fabric.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to do etamin and created beautiful designs on fabric.
meanings.sent2: The etamin embroidery added a touch of elegance to the tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The etamin embroidery on his shirt made it look like he was wearing a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like etamin embroidery, adding color and joy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The etamin embroidery depicted a scene of nature so lifelike, it seemed to come alive.
